name: The Forest Below
description:
The Forest Below is a pixel art experience with a deliberately minimalist and  contemplative gameplay.

Protect the ancient Monolith to keep the forest alive!  🌲

Move with arrows or WASD. Run with shift, use the spirits following you with space. 

The evil demons will ignore you but if they destroy the monolith, you lose.

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 46 by Raphaël Sfeir
